title: Tsimintiri Archaic Site
description: The small Aegean island of Tsimintiri, located between Despotiko and Antiparos, has produced archaeological evidence for a large sanctuary and/or other public complex of archaic date, likely to be associated with the extensive archaic sanctuary of Mandra, located on the island of Despotiko, to which Tsimintiri was connected in antiquity.

properties.description: Rough centerpoint on Google Earth imagery dating to 8/15/2021, identified with reference to figure 8.16 in Alexandridou 2022.
properties.title: Imagery Location: Archaic structures excavated in 2020
